mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "userId", a.service_user AS "serviceUser.id", u3.login_name AS "serviceUser.name", a.content AS "content", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.id = a.service_user
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_service_user_complain( id, user_id, service_user, content, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{serviceUser.id}, #{content}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_service_user_complain SET user_id = #{userId}, service_user = #{serviceUser.id}, content = #{content}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
